LanguageData.JungleAdvancedHelmet.label: flak helmet (jungle)
LanguageData.JungleAdvancedHelmet.description: A lightweight combat helmet with a complex design, reinforced with plasteel. Not effective against blunt weapons. This helmet has a jungle camo design.
LanguageData.JungleFlakVest.label: flak vest (jungle)
LanguageData.JungleFlakVest.description: A vest with armor plates inserted on the chest and back. While quite effective at deflecting gunshots and stabbing attacks against the chest, it does nothing to protect the limbs. This vest has a jungle camo design.
LanguageData.JungleFlakPants.label: flak pants (jungle)
LanguageData.JungleFlakPants.description: A pair of pants with armor plates sewn in. While it's not as good as solid armor, it offers effective protection against all manner of attacks while remaining quite comfortable. They have a jungle camo design.
LanguageData.JungleFlakJacket.label: flak jacket (jungle)
LanguageData.JungleFlakJacket.description: A tough fabric jacket with armor plates sewn in. While it's not as good as solid armor, it offers effective protection against all manner of attacks while remaining quite comfortable. It has a jungle camo design.
